title: 29letters
content:
hello

i am searching for a name for my future Arabic type design website.  
after several names i liked '29Letters'.

29 not 26 because the arabic alphabet consists of 29 letters and not only 26 like the latin.

so the domain will be:

[www.29letters.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021043905/http:/www.29letters.com/ "www.29letters.com")

how does it sound?

cheers

pascal
author: pascal zoghbi

comments.content: I think Tarek Atrissi would approve indeed!

Sounds -and more importantly, writes- quite nice!  
Now for a logo... :-)

hhp

thank you for your replies

well all of you who responded like it.

i think that is good.

any one how did not find it nice?

as for the logotype....  
if i chose this domain, i will also post my logotype sketches for you also to comment on.

cheers

Pascal Zoghbi  
MD type & Media

conserning the reply from Seventy7

what do you realy mean by:

"I think Tarek Atrissi would approve indeed!"

tarek websites are more straight forward.  
 [www.arabictypography.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021043905/http:/www.arabictypography.com/ "www.arabictypography.com") &  
 [www.atrissi.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021043905/http:/www.atrissi.com/ "www.atrissi.com")

?

do you know tarek?

cheers

Pascal Zoghbi  
MD type & Media
